Name: Apple Blossom
Ingredients: 20 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Gin & Juice with a little extra interest courtesy of a splash of apple brandy.
History: In W. J. Tarling's 1937 Café Royal Cocktail Book the invention of this cocktail is credited to one R. G. Buckby.
Nutrition: One serving of Apple Blossom contains 188 calories
